_meanings:
{@--4@} Practice of religious rites or
ceremonies, any religious rite or
ceremony; {#kiMtvanuzWAnanityatvaM#} 
{#svAtaMtryamapakarzati#} <ls>U. 1. 8</ls>; <ls>Mv. 4. 33.</ls>

‘the body of action’; 
(according to the Sāṃkhya doctrine)
the intermediate body between the
{#sUkzma#} or subtle and the {#sTUla#} or gross
body.
